text: Mata is a municipality in Rio Grande do Sul in Brazil. == Paleontology == The city of Mata has large deposits of petrified trees. Museum of the city that have fossils: #Museum Daniel Cargnin. #Palaeobotanical Garden in Mata File:Museu Padre Cargnin.JPG|Museum Daniel Cargnin File:Parque paleobotânico de Mata..JPG|Petrified wood in the Paleobotanic Park File:Sao Roque.JPG|São Roque community File:Madeira petrficada.JPG|Petrified wood ==References== == External links == * Category:Municipalities in Rio Grande do Sul
title: Mata, Rio Grande do Sul
